column4: ive followed all the proper steps to making my desktop cube a cube, but its a cylinder!!!  what did i do wrong!!? lol
cylinder?  wow that would be cool
yea it was cool for a bit.. lol
the cube is like that too.. after a while it doesn't grow on you
i love it tho, to have it to show off to everyone else who doesnt believe in ubuntu/linux
include the nick in the line.. type the first few characters and hit TAB to auto complete
thank you
did you install ccsm?
yessir, installed that, then went into it, and enabled desktop cube, 3d cube, disabled the desktop background thing, put up 4 workspaces on the bottom left
ah.. the workspaces on the bottom left don't do much with cube.. the workspaces are adjusted in ccsm
yea i was reading a forum that said not to do the ccsm option, but to do the bottom right?  anyways, i tried both ways, they are both adjusted together anyways...?
under general settings/Desktop size put 4 1 1
411, set -- still a weird cylinder... lol
I'm stuck.. you might ask in #ubuntu-effects which actually takes you to #compiz I think
sorry for this question, how do i get there? lol what do i type?
type /join #ubuntu-effects
thank you so much for ur time, really appreciate it!
np :)
don't forget the /
hahahaha, woops... lol thanks
hey, just wanted to tell u that the cube thing resolved itself with a RESTART... bruuutal
